title: Chapter 2805 - Chapter 2805: Chapter 2805-Dragonhead
body:
Chapter 2805 - Chapter 2805: Chapter 2805-Dragonhead

Chapter 2805: Chapter 2805-Dragonhead

as expected, this Divine Dragon materialization secret technique is incomplete. If it was complete, I would definitely be able to cultivate the nine-clawed Divine Dragon phenomenon. I might even be able to cultivate more than one, two, three, four, or even more.

Lu Ming pondered in his heart. He was extremely eager for the complete divine Dragon materialization art.

Think about it, once he made a move, he could directly condense dozens of divine Dragons. How amazing would his power be?

The divine Dragon materialization art was simply too suitable for him.

There was no doubt that condensing the divine Dragon phenomenon would consume a lot of divine power. However, Lu Ming cultivated the universal Dao mantra and could cultivate many divine flames. His divine power was much stronger than others.

Also, he had the quantity formula and did not have to worry about not having enough Shen power.

the Tianhong Saint son’s Divine Dragon materialization technique was obtained from an ancient relic. Does that relic have a complete divine Dragon phenomenon? ”

Lu Ming pondered. He really wanted to obtain the complete divine Dragon phenomenon. Once he obtained it, his combat strength would be greatly improved.

go and ask Ouyang Qingxiang. Let’s see if she understands.

At the thought of this, Lu Ming left the courtyard and headed to Ouyang Qingxiang’s residence.

The place where the saintess lived was naturally extraordinary. It occupied an entire mountain peak and was guarded.

how impressive. Unfortunately, there are too few people who came to me. Otherwise, I could also apply for a mountain to live on.

Lu Ming thought to himself.

Of course, he only had two or three subordinates now. It would be a joke if he applied for a mountain with no one living in it.

“Stop!”

When Lu Ming came to the front of the mountain peak, he was blocked by a few young women.

However, when the few young women saw Lu Ming’s appearance clearly, they revealed looks of admiration.

“Holy Son Lu Ming, it’s you!”

“Holy Son Lu Ming, are you here to see our Holy maiden?“

A few young and beautiful women blinked their big eyes and sized Lu Ming up curiously.

Lu Ming had only joined the sect for a few decades and had become the Holy Son with his true God-level cultivation. He was simply a legend in the Kong Xuan sect. Since ancient times, beauties loved heroes. Naturally, they were curious and worshiped him.

yes, I’m here to see Holy maiden Qingxiang. I’ll have to trouble you to inform her!

Lu Ming smiled.

“Alright. Please wait a moment, Holy Son Lu Ming.”

Immediately, a young woman flew towards the mountain peak. After a while, a few figures flew out. The person in the lead was Ouyang Xiangxiang.

“Lu Ming, why are you looking for me today? Come, please come in!”

Ouyang Xiangxiang smiled and flew toward the peak with Lu Ming. They arrived at a Pavilion and sat opposite each other.

I’m here today to ask about Tianhong’s Divine Dragon materialization technique. Saintess Qingxiang said that Tianhong’s Divine Dragon materialization technique came from an ancient ruin. I wonder where that ruin is? ”

Lu Ming asked.

it seems that brother Lu has remembered the complete divine Dragon materialization technique. However, if you want to cultivate it, you need a rich Divine Dragon bloodline. Otherwise, even if you get it, you can’t cultivate it. What does brother Lu want the divine Dragon materialization technique for? A gift?”

Ouyang Qingxiang asked curiously.

“Of course I’m going to train by myself.”

Lu Ming said with a smile.

“Cultivate on your own?” Ouyang Xiangxiang was even more curious. However, the next moment, her beautiful eyes widened as a Divine Dragon suddenly appeared above Lu Ming’s head.

“Divine Dragon phenomenon, and it’s an eight-clawed Divine Dragon phenomenon!”

Ouyang Qingxiang’s Red lips widened in shock, and she only recovered after a long while.

brother Lu, I’ve really underestimated you. I didn’t expect you to have the bloodline of a Divine Dragon in your body. Furthermore, you’ve managed to cultivate the divine Dragon phenomenon in just a month. It’s even an eight-clawed Divine Dragon. I wonder what Tian Hong’s expression will be like when he sees this? ”

Ouyang Xiangxiang exclaimed.

unfortunately, the divine Dragon materialization technique that Tianhong gave me was incomplete.

Lu Ming sighed.

Ouyang Qingxiang finally understood why Lu Ming wanted the complete divine Dragon materialization technique.

Tianhong found the divine Dragon materialization technique in an ancient ruin, ” ye mo said. he’s been keeping the ruin a secret all these years and has been excavating it secretly. I guess he wants to get the complete divine Dragon materialization technique, but he hasn’t succeeded.

I once sent people to investigate and found out where the ruins were.

Ouyang Qingxiang said.

“I know!”

Lu Ming’s eyes lit up.

Ouyang Qingxiang nodded. the ruins are in a rather remote place in the Qin heaven star system. It’s a place called the yellow wind Galaxy. Lu Ming, if you want to go, I can go with you.

“Thank you!”

Lu Ming stood up to thank him.

With Ouyang Xiangxiang going with him, his confidence would be much greater.

“There’s no time to waste. Let’s go now.”

Ouyang Xiangxiang was also a decisive person. She immediately went to the teleportation array of the Kong Xuan sect with Lu Ming. They took the teleportation array and rushed to the yellow wind Galaxy.

The yellow wind Galaxy was very far away from the Kong Xuan sect. It took the two of them a month and a half to arrive at a planet in the yellow wind Galaxy by using the teleportation formation.

After that, the two of them boarded the interplanetary warship and flew toward their destination.

After flying for a few more days, a strange planet appeared in front of them.

From afar, this planet looked like a dragon’s head. It was like a gigantic Divine Dragon that had its head chopped off. Its head was floating in the air, forming a planet.

this is Dragonhead planet, ” ye mo said. there are no living creatures on this planet. It’s a desolate place. The relic of the divine Dragon materialization technique that Tian Hong obtained is on this planet.

now, Tianhong is probably on this planet. We should be careful not to alert him.

Ouyang Qingxiang said.

Lu Ming nodded. Immediately, the two of them exited the interplanetary warship and appeared in the starry sky.

With Lu Ming’s current cultivation, he could still fly in the starry sky for a short time.

As for Ouyang Xiangxiang, she was a heavenly God and could cross the starry sky with her own strength.

The two of them concealed their auras and flew toward Dragonhead star.

Not long after, the two of them entered the atmosphere of Dragonhead planet and landed on a mountain.

the ruins should be in the East. Let’s go.

Ouyang Qingxiang said.

Dragon head planet wasn’t very big. It was much smaller than the other life planets. In a short while, they had flown past more than half of the planets.

A huge mountain range appeared in front of them, like a Divine Dragon lying on the ground.

Suddenly, they saw a figure flash by. The two of them quickly hid and watched from afar.

At the head of the mountain range, there was a huge cave. A group of people were guarding the cave.

There were young people and old people.

it’s Tian Hong’s men. It seems that Tian Hong is indeed here.

Ouyang Qingxiang said.

Lu Ming frowned slightly. The people from the Tian Hong sect were guarding the entrance of the cave. How were they going to enter?
